DOC.brief_title: Bortezomib , Paclitaxel , Carboplatin Treating Patients With Metastatic Melanoma
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVE : I . Determine confirm tumor response rate adverse event profile bortezomib , carboplatin , paclitaxel first-line therapy patient metastatic melanoma . SECONDARY OBJECTIVE : I . Evaluate time tumor progression , overall survival , duration response . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive bortezomib intravenously ( IV ) 3-5 second day 1 , 4 , 8 paclitaxel IV 3 hour carboplatin IV 30 minute day 2 . Treatment repeat every 3 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically 3 year .
